mil.emp3.api

Class Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.abstracts.Container
      • mil.emp3.api.abstracts.Feature
        • mil.emp3.api.Path
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContainer, IFeature, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoBase, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoContainer, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPositionGroup, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoRenderable

    public class Path
extends mil.emp3.api.abstracts.Feature
implements IFeature
    This class implements the Path (Multi segment line) feature. It accepts a list of coordinates where each adjacent pair of coordinates identifies a line segment.
